title: You are now on a date with your highest female Mastery Champion
body:
Edit: This post also includes male champs if you are a girl or gay guy, as well as any other sexual affiliations I may not be aware of.
Ps. speaking of that, if you know Orianna's backstory, then would you think we Ori lover's are necrophiliacs? 
{{champion:61}}
after explaining what a date is, what people do on date's, what people where on date's, why people date, and the known history of recorded dates, we missed our reservations and ended up watching I-Robot and 2001 Space Odyssey. After that I spend 2 hours explaining Sleeping, Dreaming, and the need for sleep to her, before spending an hour trying to sleep with a robot girl staring at me in the dark.

Probably my best date as of now
